author: Danyal Rasool
title: Azhar Ali backs Misbah-ul-Haq's call to extend World Test Championship
description: Pakistan Test captain happy to play behind closed doors if that helps cricket return to TV | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: Pakistan Test captain Azhar Ali has joined Misbah-ul-Haq, the head coach and chief selector, in asking for the World Test Championship to be extended looking at the way the cricket calendar has been affected because of the Covid-19 pandemic. Ali, in an online… [+4206 chars]
